meanings.definition: The act of changing the position or order of things.
meanings.sent1: She made some rearrangements in her room to make space for a new desk.
meanings.sent2: The rearrangements in the living room made it look more spacious.
meanings.sent3: The rearrangements of the furniture confused the cat, who kept looking for his favorite spot.
meanings.sent4: After the rearrangements in the office, it felt like a whole new workspace.
meanings.sent5: The rearrangements of the books on the shelf made them easier to find.

meanings.definition: The result of changing the position or order of things.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected rearrangements in the schedule caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: The rearrangements of the menu led to an increase in customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The rearrangements of the seating plan at the wedding reception created some funny mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: The rearrangements of the puzzle pieces revealed a hidden picture.
meanings.sent5: The rearrangements of the plants in the garden brought new life to the backyard.
